page.title: 15KINGMOOR GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {KINGMOOR GAMES CHILDREN PLAY There are lots of games Kingmoor children play.{Kingy}is a popualar one.You need lots of people and one person has a ball and runs after the other people and tries to hit them with it.If anyone is hit that person becomes man and then has to try and hit the rest of the people with the ball. The idea is to pass the ball round quickly so that the players are caught off their guard and are hit with ball. {Bug-Off}is a good game to play. You need three or more people. One person stands at a post and counts to fifty while the others hide.When that person has finished counting he goes and looks for the other people.
